import React, {useReducer} from 'react'; import './Body.css' import Item from './item.js' //Create items for the shop, only need to add name of item and price and it will create a new html object export default function Body(){ const [ignored, forceUpdate] = useReducer(x=>x+1,0); let total = 0; const onAdd = (num) =>{ total = total + num forceUpdate() } const onSub = (num) =>{ total = total - num forceUpdate() } return(

{total}

) }
